column4: please someone, I have problem with my sound card, and I dont know how to fix it
coz I could play to videos 2gether and to have sound in both
you could also try the alsa wrapper for OSS , might work for that
how can i sent something to my sound device ?? to check if it works?
you could go to system -> preferences -> sound and play a sound
it doesnt see my sound card
try this on a console and see what you get: alsamixer -c 0
alsamixer: function snd_ctl_open failed for hw:0: No such file or directory
is like i dont have a sound device
yeah, that's what it looks like
have you tried the forums, maybe something will come up there
no, but there is any room in freenode that they deal with sound problems?? u know.. with alsa etc
ubuntu has any hardware detector to check if it can see my sound card ?? it is integrated u know
